metadata.name: WAGMI/REKT
metadata.description: WAGMI/REKT? Follow me on my year of experimenting with code as I release editions of my work each month. This is a true open edition that will continue in perpetuity. Burn 24 of these to get a year's pass that will allow you to redeem editions for every month, 16 for a half year's pass. Burn event to redeem passes happen on Jan 2nd 2023.
